name: Gravitar
summary: Gravitar is a color vector graphics arcade game released by Atari, Inc. in 1982. It was the first of over twenty games (including the 1983 Star Wars) Mike Hally designed and produced for Atari. The main programmer was Rich Adam and the cabinet art was designed by Brad Chaboya. Over 5,427 cabinets were produced.
